$
ABOUT THE LODGE
/$
$
Nestled in the heart of historic downtown Ocala,
The Lodge Ocala is the perfect hub to watch your favorite game, hang out with friends and have a good time.
We've got 100+ craft beers, full bar, and a menu of tasty tavern fare that’s crafted to go perfectly with our drinks.
So c'mon! There’s no better place to celebrate sports, food, and friends.
​
As of September 25, 2024 The Lodge Ocala Pub and Eatery is under new Ownership. It is now owned by Johnny and Rachael Sanchez.
/$
$
what's upstairs?
/$
$
Upstairs holds Downtown Ocala's upscale & stylish lounge overlooking the Downtown Square.
Featuring nightly events, parties, bottle service, live DJ's, photographers, and themed parties.
